What is the virtual DOM?: The virtual DOM is a lightweight copy of the real DOM used by React to improve performance.
Can you explain RESTful APIs?: RESTful APIs follow REST architecture principles for interaction between client and server.
What is a Promise in JavaScript?: A Promise represents the eventual completion (or failure) of an asynchronous operation.
How do you handle errors in async/await?: Use try...catch blocks around async/await logic to handle errors gracefully.
